thread.title: California Water Service Launches 11th Annual School Conservation Education Program | CWT Stock News
thread.title_full: California Water Service Launches 11th Annual School Conservation Education Program | CWT Stock News

author: California Water Service
title: California Water Service Launches 11th Annual School Conservation Education Program | CWT Stock News
text: California Water Service Launches 11th Annual School Conservation Education Program California Water Service (Cal Water) has launched its 11th annual water conservation education program, Tap Into Learning, for K-12 students in partnership with DoGoodery. The program offers various opportunities for students and classrooms in Cal Water service areas to engage in water conservation and sustainability activities throughout the 2024-25 academic year. Key components include: - Aqua Adventures: Free water-and nature-based field trips for grades 4-6 - A Splash of Creativity: Art competition focused on water care - Water Smart Grants: $100 grants for classroom water projects - H2Oath: Water conservation pledges for students and classrooms The program aims to inspire students to become ambassadors for water resource sustainability and conservation. California Water Service (Cal Water) ha lanciato il suo undicesimo programma annuale di educazione al risparmio idrico, Tap Into Learning, per studenti dalla K-12 in collaborazione con DoGoodery. Il programma offre diverse opportunità per studenti e classi nelle aree servite da Cal Water per partecipare ad attività di risparmio e sostenibilità idrica durante l'anno accademico 2024-25. I componenti chiave includono: - Aqua Adventures: Gite gratuite a tema acqua e natura per le classi 4-6 - A Splash of Creativity: Concorso artistico incentrato sulla cura dell'acqua - Water Smart Grants: Sovvenzioni di 100$ per progetti idrici in aula - H2Oath: Promesse di risparmio idrico per studenti e classi Il programma ha l'obiettivo di ispirare gli studenti a diventare ambasciatori per la sostenibilità e il risparmio delle risorse idriche. California Water Service (Cal Water) ha lanzado su undécimo programa anual de educación sobre conservación del agua, Tap Into Learning, para estudiantes de K-12 en colaboración con DoGoodery. El programa ofrece diversas oportunidades para que estudiantes y aulas en las áreas de servicio de Cal Water participen en actividades de conservación y sostenibilidad del agua a lo largo del año académico 2024-25. Los componentes clave incluyen: - Aqua Adventures: Excursiones gratuitas basadas en agua y naturaleza para grados 4-6 - A Splash of Creativity: Concurso de arte enfocado en el cuidado del agua - Water Smart Grants: Subvenciones de 100$ para proyectos de agua en el aula - H2Oath: Compromisos de conservación del agua para estudiantes y aulas El programa tiene como objetivo inspirar a los estudiantes a convertirse en embajadores de la sostenibilidad y conservación de los recursos hídricos. 캘리포니아 워터 서비스(Cal Water)는 DoGoodery와 협력하여 K-12 학생들을 위한 제11회 연례 물 절약 교육 프로그램 Tap Into Learning을 시작했습니다. 이 프로그램은 Cal Water 서비스 지역의 학생들과 교실이 2024-25 학년도 동안 물 절약과 지속 가능성 활동에 참여할 수 있는 다양한 기회를 제공합니다. 주요 구성 요소는 다음과 같습니다: - Aqua Adventures: 4-6학년을 위한 무료 물과 자연 기반 현장 학습 - A Splash of Creativity: 물 보호에 중점을 둔 예술 대회 - Water Smart Grants: 교실의 물 프로젝트를 위한 100달러의 보조금 - H2Oath: 학생과 교실을 위한 물 절약 서약 이 프로그램은 학생들이 물 자원의 지속 가능성과 절약을 위한 대사가 되도록 영감을 주는 것을 목표로 합니다. California Water Service (Cal Water) a lancé son onzième programme éducatif annuel sur la conservation de l'eau, Tap Into Learning, pour les élèves de la maternelle à la terminale en partenariat avec DoGoodery. Ce programme offre diverses opportunités aux élèves et aux classes dans les zones desservies par Cal Water de participer à des activités de conservation et de durabilité de l'eau tout au long de l'année scolaire 2024-25. Les principaux composants comprennent : - Aqua Adventures: Excursions gratuites axées sur l'eau et la nature pour les classes de 4 à 6 - A Splash of Creativity: Concours d'art centré sur la protection de l'eau - Water Smart Grants: Subventions de 100 $ pour des projets d'eau en classe - H2Oath: Engagements de conservation de l'eau pour les élèves et les classes Ce programme vise à inspirer les élèves à devenir des ambassadeurs de la durabilité et de la conservation des ressources en eau. California Water Service (Cal Water) hat sein elftes jährliches Bildungsprogramm zur Wassereinsparung, Tap Into Learning, für Schüler im K-12-Bereich in Partnerschaft mit DoGoodery gestartet. Das Programm bietet verschiedene Möglichkeiten für Schüler und Klassen in den Cal Water-Dienstgebieten, sich während des Schuljahres 2024-25 an Wasserspar- und Nachhaltigkeitsaktivitäten zu beteiligen. Die wichtigsten Komponenten umfassen: - Aqua Adventures: Kostenlose wasser- und naturbezogene Exkursionen für die Klassen 4-6 - A Splash of Creativity: Kunstwettbewerb mit Fokus auf den Schutz von Wasser - Water Smart Grants: 100-Dollar-Stipendien für Wasserprojekte im Klassenraum - H2Oath: Wassersparversprechen für Schüler und Klassen Das Programm zielt darauf ab, Schüler zu inspirieren, Botschafter für die Nachhaltigkeit und den Schutz der Wasserressourcen zu werden. - Continued investment in water conservation education for K-12 students - Multiple engagement opportunities for students and classrooms - Potential for positive brand image and community relations - None. Teachers, Students K-12 Encouraged to Engage in Learning About Water SAN JOSE, Calif., Sept. 19, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- California Water Service (Cal Water), in partnership with DoGoodery, has launched its 11th annual water conservation education program for schools and students in kindergarten through 12th grade. [Tap Into Learning](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=9quvD-BF-yy0fMuGwIqxqv5nWTyRGJwdlUcYU8uUyRO8FmHT5TmI-ZdqfR-bFF9op7-2EOBKR2GsXsrwHB3gSkOR9PmVxE959XsWZfByIqs=) offers multiple opportunities for students, classrooms, and school-based clubs in Cal Water service areas to engage in activities related to water conservation and sustainability throughout the 2024-25 academic year. Program components include: - Aqua Adventures, which offers free water-and nature-based field trips for upper elementary classrooms, grades 4-6, in Cal Water service areas. Teachers simply enter their classroom online for a chance at one of 12 annual field trips. - A Splash of Creativity, an art competition in which students submit original artwork focused on caring for water. This competition is open to individual students in grades K-12 living or attending a school in a Cal Water service area and offers multiple tiers of awards. - Water Smart Grants, offering $100 grants to teachers proposing classroom water projects. Applications are open year-round to teachers in grades 4-6 in Cal Water service areas. - H2Oath, which enables individual students or classrooms to commit to water conservation pledges and learn more about this topic. Additional opportunities are available for participating classes. “We are pleased to see students all over California continue to be inspired to care for water and become ambassadors for water resource sustainability and conservation year after year,” said Martin A. Kropelnicki, Cal Water Chairman and CEO. “We are even more pleased our Tap Into Learning program helps facilitate this education and advocacy in students and teachers across our service areas, who will lead us into the future.” "We deeply value Cal Water's unwavering leadership in water conservation, especially in fostering youth engagement," said Christiane Maertens, Founder and CEO of DoGoodery. "With Cal Water's continued support, Tap Into Learning is expanding to offer even more students the chance to connect with nature and gain a deeper understanding of the importance of water in our daily lives. Together, we’re sparking curiosity and awareness in the next generation and the role today's youth can play in caring for water and shaping a brighter future.” For more information about the program and eligibility requirements, visit [challenge.calwater.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=tBKkeHDx2c_TXuYwPnahhOSY29fUTdPiqIGw-wYrYO7-LgHE0wTgCDhEmpwjr2mzBz-CvPhrDqT4uZS1YmBOgvq69HrbUr0U70JM6_BVCIU=). About California Water Service California Water Service provides high-quality, reliable water utility services to more than 2 million people statewide through 497,700 service connections. Cal Water’s purpose is to enhance the quality of life for customers and communities. To do so, it invests responsibly in water and wastewater infrastructure, sustainability initiatives, and community well-being. The company’s 1,100+ employees live by a set of strong core values and share a commitment to protecting the planet, caring for people, and operating with the utmost integrity. The utility has been named one of “America’s Most Responsible Companies” and “World’s Most Trustworthy Companies” by Newsweek, a Top Workplace, and a Great Place to Work®. More information is available at [www.calwater.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=ZjsVxUF0i3rDOSXxWQBqo0rsiqTSJSDsyr2xGwT8Ttu2RQU2iZ1EbxLzb99QxJwsy-WyRNSJgNKVcH9OYfFxLw==). About DoGoodery DoGoodery is a full-service agency that provides customized strategies and services to help its customers reach their impact goals. Its expertise spans a wide range of critical social areas with a foundation in business, and it collaborates with customer teams to custom-design innovative strategies and seamlessly manage and execute the work. For more information, visit [www.dogoodery.com](https://www.globenewswire.com/Tracker?data=QgsDc-YJ5B-XKPCFkHh5C8lFZ2Q6vdPjo2rQ-G2u1e7c4X4RlzG9oLVmc3QzaSKUqdAmCNImkUk1Owxnk9f8ui0OEiBzjxR5hOm7gFJKKmc=). Contact: Yvonne Kingman, 310-257-1434 FAQ What is Cal Water's Tap Into Learning program for 2024-25? What opportunities does Cal Water's Tap Into Learning program offer for students?
